name: BrokersWeb Ads
author: BrokersWeb

sections.description:
BrokersWeb Official WordPress Plugin, helps the user to add the BrokersWeb render script without havign to touch your PHP or any code at all!

You Must be registered at BrokersWeb.com

Support

Our Solution
BrokersWeb is a premium, vertically-targeted, pay-per-click (PPC) traffic source for over 150 top-rated advertisers. With roots as an insurance sales organization, we understand the conversion needs of our clients. BrokersWeb has grown into one of the leading ROI-driven, online marketing channels for PPC advertisers, delivering tens of thousands of ultra-targeted consumers to our advertising clients on a daily basis. read more

Advertisers
BrokersWeb can deliver high-converting visitors to your own website while exceeding your ROI thresholds.

Publishers
BrokersWeb provides monetization partnerships for quality publishers with an ability to deliver highly-targeted consumers.
sections.installation:
Manual installation:

  1. Upload the ‘BrokersWeb Ads’ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

Installation using ‘Add New Plugin’

  1. From your Admin UI (Dashboard), use the menu to select Plugins -> Add New
  2. Search for ‘BrokersWeb Ads’
  3. Click the ‘Install’ button to open the plugin’s repository listing

Activiation and Use

  1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  2. From your Admin UI (Dashboard), use the menu to select Options -> BrokersWeb Ads
  3. Configure settings, and save.
